name: VIC20 - Rush (2015)
description:
A heist has gone wrong and now you are being chased!

Escape the police by running and jumping from rooftop to rooftop, while grabbing leftover cash wherever you can

Now run!

Game Features:

- Available on Tape and as Digital Download
- Runs on an unexpanded Commodore VIC-20
- Combined Multicolored and Hires graphics
- Parallax scrolling
- Flickerfree gameplay
